name: AccessibilityChecker
description: Check the compliance of web pages for patters os accessibility using aXe rules
author: Alexandre Campos e Vinicius Martins

inputs.name: urlfile
inputs.label: Urls File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to file with url to be tested. IF provided URL To Test will be ignored

inputs.name: urls
inputs.label: Urls To Test
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of comma separated urls to test.

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags used to filter the tasks, separated by comma.

inputs.name: loginurl
inputs.label: URL to Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL used to provide user and pass before running the validation, leave in blank if no login is required

inputs.name: userControlName
inputs.label: HTML id of UserName Control
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the object used to type username in order to login in the app

inputs.name: passControlName
inputs.label: HTML id of Password Control
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the object used to type password in order to login in the app

inputs.name: user
inputs.label: User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Value of the User Name typed in the login page of the app

inputs.name: pass
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Value of the Password typed in the login page of the app

inputs.name: loginButtonName
inputs.label: HTML id of Login Button
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the button clicked after type user and pass to submit login

inputs.name: titleToWait
inputs.label: Title to wait
inputs.helpMarkDown: Title of the landing page after login

inputs.name: documenturl
inputs.label: DcoumentDB Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: End point to database to save results, leave blank to slip this step

inputs.name: primarykey
inputs.label: Document write Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Key to authenticate in DocumentDB, should be stored in a encripted variable.

messages.GruntCliNotInstalled: Grunt-cli is not installed globally (or is not in the path of the user the agent is running as) and it is not in the local working folder: %s
messages.GruntReturnCode: Accessibility analysis exited with return code: %d
